com.myjavatools.lib
Interface Files.BufferingFilter

All Superinterfaces:
Files.ByteFilter
Enclosing interface:
Files
public static interface Files.BufferingFilter
extends Files.ByteFilter

Description: Buffering filter stores some data, and these data can be later retrieved.

See Also:
#Files.ByteFilter

Method Summary
 void clear()
          clears the filter buffer
 byte[] getBuffer()
          gets data stored as a result of filtering; no assumption regarding the nature of the data.
